name: Space cube!
description:
Space cube is a green cube that loves exploring outer space. One day, he crash landed on an unknown planet. This planet has so far been observed to be inhabited by angry slimes.

Controls:

W, Space-bar, or the up arrow key to jump

A or the left arrow key to move left

D or the right arrow key to move right

and Escape to open up the pause menu

This is my first "real" game. I made it in Godot :)

this sadly only has a few levels doe but i hope you enjoy it

Also if you want to join the discord here is the link: https://discord.gg/Ccv4W88Ktj
